directions: Layer apples into a slow cooker. Sprinkle cinnamon, cloves, and nutmeg over the apples.
Cook on High until apples are soft, 4 to 5 hours. Whisk apples vigorously for a chunkier-style applesauce. Puree with an immersion blender for a smoother applesauce.
ingredients: 5 pounds apples - peeled, cored, and thinly sliced
title: Slow Cooker Cider Applesauce (No Sugar Added)
